item.title: Deploy Nginx on AKS with a Pipeline
item.description: In this project, I deployed Nginx on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) using a CI/CD pipeline. I automated the deployment using Terraform scripts and used Azure DevOps to create the pipeline. Infrastructure diagram : Steps : Create a Git repository in Azure Create a Terraform script to create the AKS infrastructure Create a YAML manifest to deploy Nginx on the cluster Create the CI/CD pipeline in Azure DevOps Creating a Git repository in Azure ➡️ Sign in to your Azure DevOps account.
